tool_description: Scrape a website for key information such as fetch speed, website size, metadata (Including OG: metadata),  alt data, and much more!
name: Site Statistics And Info Crawl
title: Site Statistics And Info Crawl

api_list.name: Main Endpoint
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://site-statistics-and-info-crawl.p.rapidapi.com/stats/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "site-statistics-and-info-crawl.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://site-statistics-and-info-crawl.p.rapidapi.com/stats/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "site-statistics-and-info-crawl.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
